text: phir jab vah unako bacha leta hai, to kya dekhate hai ki ve naahaq dharatee mein sarakashee karane lag jaate hai. ai logon! tumhaaree sarakashee tumhaare apane hee viruddh hai. saansaarik jeevan ka sukh le lo. phir tumhen hamaaree hee or lautakar aana hai. phir ham tumhen bata denge jo kuchh tum karate rahe hoge
